Extract Best Euler Pole from Dispersion Grid

extract_best_ep_from_grid.Rd

Extract Best Euler Pole from Dispersion Grid

Usage

extract_best_ep_from_grid(x, antipode = FALSE)

Arguments

x

SpatRaster

antipode

logical. If TRUE, the antipode of the Euler pole is returned

Value

sf POINT object

Examples

data("san_andreas", package = "tectonicr")
euler_stress_dispersion(san_andreas, grid = latlon_grid(gridsize = 10), prd = 135) |>
  extract_best_ep_from_grid()
#> Simple feature collection with 1 feature and 1 field
#> Geometry type: POINT
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: -75 ymin: 45 xmax: -75 ymax: 45
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
#>   dispersion       geometry
#> 1   0.359578 POINT (-75 45)
